text: aap ne farmaya is ka apni dumbiyo ke saath teri ek dumbi milaane ka sawaal, beshak tere upar ek zulm hai aur aksar hisse daar aur shareek (aise hee hote hai ke) ek dosre par zulm karte hai, sivaaye un ke jo imaan laaye aur jinhone nek amal kiye aur aise log bahuth hee kam hai aur (hazrath) Dawoodh(alaihissalaam) samajh gaye ke hum ne unhe azmaaya hai, phir to apne rub se isteghfaar karne lage aur aajizi karte hoye gir pade aur (puri tarah) rujo kiya
